DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare absorption distribution single oral dose TC-5214 subject renal impairment subject normal renal function .
DOC.brief_title: To Compare Pharmacokinetics Single Oral Dose TC-5214 Subjects With Renal Impairment With Subjects With Normal Renal Function
DOC.criteria: Males nonpregnant , nonlactating female 18 80 year old inclusive suitable vein cannulation repeat venipuncture weight least 50 kg . Regarding renal function , subject classify either normal suffering mild , moderate severe renal impairment . Classification renal impairment base use abbreviated 4 variable Modified Diet Renal Disease ( MDRD ) equation . To ensure assessment consistent estimate glomerular filtration rate ( eGFR ) use MDRD , single equation use ( see Section 6.2 ) Negative screen Human Immunodeficiency Virus negative result serum hepatitis B surface antigen Regarding renal function , subject classify either normal suffering mild , moderate severe renal impairment . Classification renal impairment base use abbreviated 4 variable MDRD equation . To ensure assessment consistent estimate glomerular filtration rate ( eGFR ) use MDRD , single equation use . History clinically significant medical , neurologic psychiatric disease disorder ( previously define acceptable population ) , opinion Investigator sponsor , may either put subject risk participation study , influence result subject 's ability participate study : This include seizure activity repeat episode major depression . Subjects history suicide attempt past year and/or see Investigator significant history risk suicide homicide , consider risk suicide homicide study Subjects active renal transplant ( subject previously receive renal transplant currently undergoing dialysis due transplant failure may enrol ) Any clinically significant acute illness medical/surgical procedure within 4 week first administration investigational product ( IP ) ( previously define acceptable population ) judge Investigator . Positive test drug abuse screen ( except prescription medication , verify Investigator ) , alcohol admission clinic prior administration IP
